welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eastchester, a charming and historic city known for its picturesque landscapes and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time in Eastchester!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for major airlines such as Air Canada, British Airways, and Lufthansa.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting 'HPN Airport WiFi' from their device's list of available networks.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights for major airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport houses ticket counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow or unreliable at times.
